name: stream-cc
description: A lightweight, browser-based streaming tool for automatic closed captioning using the SpeechRecognition API

scripts.prod: npm run build && npx http-server dist -p 1235 --proxy http://localhost:1235?
scripts.deploy: npm run build && git push origin `git subtree split --prefix dist main`:gh-pages --force
scripts.deploy:only_first: rm -rf node_modules && npm install && git checkout -b gh-pages && git push --set-upstream origin gh-pages && npm run deploy && git checkout main
